title: (UCTF) Capture the Flag Participant â€” Trend Micro
tags: CTF, Trend Micro, Cybersecurity, Competition, UCTF
content: Our team competed in the University Capture the Flag (UCTF) by Trend Micro, ranking 87th out of 199 teams. A valuable learning experience that sharpened our cybersecurity skills and teamwork.

title: CTF Industrial Intrusion Participant (TryHackMe)
tags: CTF, TryHackMe, Cybersecurity, Industrial Intrusion, OSINT
content: My first Capture the Flag (CTF) experience with a team, where we explored an industrial-themed environment, solved real-world cybersecurity challenges, and learned the value of teamwork.

title: Blog (Medium)
content: I started blogging on Medium to document my learning process, share write-ups, and reflect on my cybersecurity and tech journey.

title: Google Cybersecurity Certification
tags: Certification, Google, Cybersecurity, Python, Bash, Networking
content: The Google Cybersecurity Professional Certificate provided me with a solid foundation in cybersecurity, including hands-on experience with Python, Bash, networking, and essential security practices.
